summary: Phase 3 Platform UI Testing Complete - All platform pages and backend APIs tested successfully. 100% pass rate on backend tests (12/12), 100% pass rate on frontend UI tests. All data-testids verified.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` - minor accessibility improvement needed

action_items: Minor: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent in FolderExplorer.tsx for accessibility compliance
seed_data_creation: None required - testing public endpoints and unauthenticated UI flows
context_for_next_testing_agent: All platform pages (/platform/*) are working correctly. Sidebar navigation has 5 items (Home, Agents, Workflows, Knowledge Base, Meetings) - Response tab is correctly hidden for non-vendor users. Knowledge Base page has Explorer and AI Chat tabs with FolderExplorer, file upload zone. Response page has two-step wizard with Templates/Web Search/Manual Entry tabs. All data-testids verified: folder-explorer, scope-toggle-private, scope-toggle-organization, folder-search-input, new-folder-btn, folder-name-input, create-folder-submit-btn, file-upload-zone, browse-files-btn, contextual-chat, chat-message-input, chat-send-btn, response-wizard, wizard-step-1-btn, generate-rfp-btn, rfp-context-textarea, web-search-input, web-search-btn, create-blank-draft-btn, draft-editor-textarea, copy-draft-btn, back-to-context-btn, sync-integrations-btn, create-agent-btn, new-workflow-btn, schedule-meeting-btn, sidebar-signout-btn.

backend_tests.health_endpoint: PASS - Returns 200 with 4 services (mongodb: healthy, pinecone: configured, azure_openai: configured, supabase: configured)
backend_tests.rfp_templates_endpoint: PASS - Returns 6 aviation templates with correct categories (IFE, MRO, Catering, Ground Handling, Connectivity, Digital)

frontend_tests.platform_home: PASS - Sidebar (5 nav items), 4 stat cards, 4 quick action links, Response tab hidden for non-vendor
frontend_tests.knowledge_base_explorer: PASS - Explorer tab, FolderExplorer, scope toggles, search, new folder button, file upload zone
frontend_tests.knowledge_base_ai_chat: PASS - AI Chat tab, ContextualChat component, message input, send button
frontend_tests.rfp_response_templates: PASS - Templates tab with aviation templates, context textarea, generate button
frontend_tests.rfp_response_web_search: PASS - Web search input and button
frontend_tests.rfp_response_manual: PASS - Create blank draft button, draft editor, copy/back buttons
frontend_tests.agents_page: PASS - 4 agent cards, Create Agent button
frontend_tests.workflows_page: PASS - 3 workflow cards, New Workflow button
frontend_tests.meetings_page: PASS - 3 meeting cards, Schedule Meeting button
frontend_tests.new_folder_modal: PASS - Folder name input, create folder submit button

mocked_apis_note: MOCKED: Supabase Edge Functions (validate-limits, sync-external-provider) and backend RAG processing for KB chat and RFP wizard are placeholders that fall back to error messages when Azure OpenAI is unavailable.
